columns.name: storage_account_id
columns.description: The resource id of the storage account to which you would like to send the Activity Log.

columns.name: service_bus_rule_id
columns.description: The service bus rule ID of the service bus namespace in which you would like to have Event Hubs created for streaming the Activity Log.

columns.name: locations
columns.description: List of regions for which Activity Log events should be stored or streamed. It is a comma separated list of valid ARM locations including the 'global' location.

columns.name: categories
columns.description: The categories of the logs. These categories are created as is convenient to the user.

columns.name: retention_policy
columns.description: The retention policy for the events in the log.
